TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItem extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a subitem of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件显示的项定义的列表类。A control displays a list of items that are defined by the class. 每个可以子项对象定义的存储类。Each can store subitem objects that are defined by the class. 显示子项时属性控件设置为。Subitems are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 通常，子项包含与其父项相关的信息。Typically, subitems contain information that is related to their parent item. 例如，如果控件显示这些项表示订单，所以每个项可以显示订单号。For example, if a control displays items that represent orders, each item could display the order number. 子项无法添加到每个项可显示如订购的产品信息、 订购，项的数量和订购的商品的总价格。Subitems could be added to each item to display information such as the product ordered, the quantity of items ordered, and the total price of the items ordered. 与不同对象，直接的用户无法编辑对象 (用户可以编辑对象如果属性控件设置为`true`)。Unlike objects, objects cannot be edited directly by the user (the user can edit objects if the property of the control is set to `true`). 由于子项不能直接编辑用户，并且不会显示图像，属性仅限于那些影响子项文本的样式，以显示时控件。Because subitems cannot be directly edited by the user and do not display images, properties are limited to those that affect the style of the subitem text when it is displayed in the control. 如果属性包含子项设置为`false`，你可以使用， ，和属性来更改应用于文本显示的样式。If the property of the that contains the subitems is set to `false`, you can use the , , and properties to change the styles applied to the text display. 通常情况下，项及其子项的样式都在相同的控件，但如果你想要更改的特定样式以突出显示它，你可以在你想要以不同方式显示的项上使用这些属性。Typically, the styles of the item and the subitems are the same in a control, but if you want to change the style of a specific to highlight it, you can use these properties on the items you want to display differently. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 你需要将代码添加到和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该子项文本的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the subitem's text.
A that represents the background color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改显示子项文本的背景的颜色。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the subitem text. 可以使用此属性，如果你想要使用不同的背景和前景颜色组合 (使用要设置的前景色属性) 来区分从另一个子项。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one subitem from another. 例如，你可以设置属性来标识显示负值的子项。For example, you could set the property to to identify subitems that display a negative value. 如果属性拥有子项设置为`true`，设置此属性不起作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Bounds As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle Bounds { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

The bounding of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未添加到或拥有尚未添加到、属性返回一个空。If the has not been added to a or the owning has not been added to a , the property returns an empty .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Font ^ Font { System::Drawing::Font ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Font ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置子项显示的文本的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the subitem.

value.span: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 。

span.span: The to apply to the text displayed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于更改应用于子项的文本的字体样式。You can use this property to change the font styles applied to the text of the subitem. 如果属性设置为`true`，更改此属性将产生任何影响。If the property of the is set to `true`, changing this property will have no effect. 因为不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），您可以只分配属性指定新。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new . 但是，您可以基于新的字体基于现有的字体。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 下面是如何调整现有字体以使其成为粗体的示例：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = new Font(listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = New Font(ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, _ ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` 如果属性拥有子项设置为`true`，设置此属性不起作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性`false`定义的自定义样式对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例演示如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改子项文本的颜色。You can use the property to change the color of the subitem text. 可以使用此属性，如果你想要使用不同的背景和前景颜色组合 (使用属性设置的背景色) 来区分从另一个项。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the background color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，你可以设置属性来标识必须与它们关联添加负号的项。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have a negative number associated with them. 如果属性拥有子项设置为`true`，设置此属性不起作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性`false`定义的自定义样式对象。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例演示如何设置和属性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetStyle() cil managed

summary.span: 将应用于子项的样式重置为默认字体和颜色。

span.span: Resets the styles applied to the subitem to the default font and colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于重置的字体、 背景色和前景色设置应用于子项。You can use this method to reset the font, background color, and foreground color settings applied to the subitem. 当样式将重置时，子项将显示使用默认字体、 背景色和前景色设置。When the styles are reset, the subitem is displayed using the default font, background color, and foreground color settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重置的子项的样式使用属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to reset the style of the subitems of a through the use of the property and the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button1`，并调用`InitializeListView`窗体的构造函数中的方法或事件处理方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1`, and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#2)]
